title: Crop Insurance Scheme
description: Provides financial support to farmers in the event of crop failure due to natural calamities, pests, or diseases.

title: Rural Employment Guarantee
description: Offers 100 days of guaranteed wage employment in a financial year to rural households.

title: Subsidized Solar Pump
description: Supports farmers with the cost of installing solar-powered irrigation pumps to promote clean energy and reduce electricity costs.

title: Village Health Mission
description: Provides basic healthcare, vaccination services, and maternal care through village health workers.

title: Digital Literacy Program
description: Empowers rural youth and women with basic digital skills to improve access to online education and government portals.

title: Irrigation Modernization
description: Assists farmers with modern irrigation systems like drip and sprinkler systems to conserve water and increase yield.

title: Self-Help Group (SHG) Support
description: Provides micro-financing and entrepreneurial training to SHGs for income generation activities.

title: Sanitation Awareness Drive
description: Conducts cleanliness campaigns and provides subsidies for household toilets in rural areas.

title: Electrification of Remote Villages
description: Extends electricity supply to remote and tribal areas using solar micro-grids and sustainable energy sources.

title: E-Market Link for Farmers
description: Connects farmers directly to buyers through a digital platform, ensuring fair prices and reducing middlemen.
